title: Native Country Support
changes: Countries can now natively be selected from the country picker (when enabled)! Multiple instances for different countries are no longer needed.

title: Custom Naming Variables & Reset Settings
changes: Added custom naming variables to the settings page. You can now customise the names of downloaded tracks and zip files using special formatting options.
Added reset settings button to the bottom of the settings page.

title: Change Log & PWA Support
changes: Changelog added and now is used to handle updates and fixes along with Discord notifications
Added PWA support for easy access of the site on a mobile device for example with the abilty to add to the homescreen
Changed the border radius style to slightly more rounded, :)
